website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for buyers wanting a simple commercial mirror at a cheaper cost.
pros: Extremely affordable price when compared with similar models
Lightweight design makes for hassle-free installation
cons: Industrial style can be unappealing for some

customer_reviews.title: I can see my face
customer_reviews.text: I like my face. I think other people enjoy my face. I like that my new mirror displays my face in 4K HD digital quality to the point where you don’t quite know if it’s real or not.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Brainard

customer_reviews.title: High quality – heavy mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a heavy wall mirror. That being said, it is a very high-quality product. Apparently, most cheap mirrors distort the image they reflect due to the low-quality glass used. After using this mirror for a few days/weeks it was apparent to me that the image was undistirted to my eye.
customer_reviews.author: topamp

customer_reviews.title: Channel frame catches cleaning towel lint balls which reflect in mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love that the hanging bracket and design allows the mirror to be flush against the wall. However, the first time I cleaned it before installing it, the top edge of the bottom frame caught bits of my towel, which fell into the opening between the mirror and channel frame. Since I haven’t been able to figure how to remove them, I wish I would have returned it. It’s unfortunate because they’re reflected by the mirror and look like fuzzballs. If it weren’t for that, I’d highly recommend it for a home application, since it’s nicer than Pottery Barn or RH offerings in other ways.
customer_reviews.author: sugar snap pea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, mirror was everything advertised. Highly recommend if you are looking for a good quality commercial style mirror, solidly constructed stainless frame.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Practically Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe this mirror will ever break. I've added a wooden frame to it that matches my great grandson's dresser and it looks fabulous. The directions for mounting were very clear. This is important because the mirror is very heavy. It is surrounded by steel. I don't think my three great grandson fooling around will break this one!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Osberg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Looks very professional. Used it to replace a mirror in an upscale apartment complex. Looks exactly like the original and was a much better price. It is actually made better than the more expensive, original mirror.
customer_reviews.author: amber marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty mirror. Great mirror surface and sturdy frame. This is not something you put a single hook into the wall and call it good. It is exactly what I was looking for at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Tough and slightly rough
customer_reviews.text: Slightly rough industrial and heavy as heck but a nice item.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for great value.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not ready for install yet but I opened the well-packaged mirror. I love the look and I am impressed with the mounting instructions & included mounting strips.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Richardson

customer_reviews.title: It took me a long time to find a mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find a mirror. I looked at numerous high end retailers, but wasn’t sold on spending $300+ on a simple metal mirror. I found this and received it today. I am VERY impressed with the quality. It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is fantastic Nice stainless steel but really needs to have a horizontal mount also from mounting in the other direction.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, simple aesthetic, probably overbuilt for residential which is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Doug G.

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: The frame is a little rough. I still like them though.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: i think they are great
customer_reviews.text: Although i ended up returning the 2 mirrors i bought because they were too big for my bathroom..i think they are great mirrors
customer_reviews.author: Jon K

customer_reviews.title: VALUE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great product Great quality Arrived ahead of schedule Great experience ALL AROUND!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is the second time I have ordered these mirrors and they are extremely easy to install and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles l Mackay Jr

customer_reviews.title: To my surprise they were very easy to install and seem to be of very good ...
customer_reviews.text: Having installed many of this type of mirror in commercial projects I was skeptical of this product. To my surprise they were very easy to install and seem to be of very good quality. I will definitely be ordering more of these for my next project
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wright

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 but one came broken. It was easy to exchange but it was annoying have to get my handy man back twice to install the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a big heavy mirror that is quite substantial. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It's a mirror. Nothing more, nothing less. Product was packaged perfectly and was received damage free.
customer_reviews.author: AOW1

customer_reviews.title: This mirror only mounts vertically, not horizontally
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine except it only mounts vertically and not horizontally. Why they don’t make them to mount both ways can only be answered because of $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: rn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and a great price compared to others I checked out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brey-Krause Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: The Brey-Krause are excellent. They are extremely durable, low maintenance and very functional. I would recommend them to all parks and recreation organizations.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley G. Motley

product_meta.title: Brey-Krause T-1024-36-SS Commercial Restroom Mirror, 24-inch x 36-inch
product_meta.description: Size:36This mirror is fabricated from 18-gauge type 304 stainless steel. The corners are tightly mitered and the edges are protected by cushioned 3m adhesive strips to prevent damage. Backs are secured by continuous industrial adhesive sealant and a galvanized steel back plate for added rigidity. The one-quarter inch float glass mirror is silvered and copper-plated by galvanic process and carries a full silver spoilage. The mirror dimension is 24-inches wide by 36-inches tall. This product is manufactured in the USA using USA labor and USA sourced raw materials.
feature_bullets: Fabricated from high quality 18 gauge brushed finish stainless steel
Made in the USA using USA-sourced raw materials and labor
Engineered to install in half the time of competitor mirrors
Mirrors meet federal specifications one-quarter inch float glass silvered and electrolytic ally cop
Mirror edges are protected by cushioned adhesive strips to prevent damage

specifications.Manufacturer: Brey-Krause Commercial Restroom Mirror 24 inches Wide by 36 inches Tall
